mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID CT , INS_DATE C_DATE , CT_SUB_GRP , BRNCH_ID FROM (SELECT DISTINCT T.MEM_ID, T.CT_SUB_GRP, TT.BRNCH AS BRNCH_ID FROM SVC0054M T, ORG0001D TT WHERE T.MEM_ID = TT.MEM_ID AND TT.STUS = 1 AND CT_SUB_GRP IN (SELECT /*+ leading(E) INDEX(E SAL0023D_IDX5) USE_NL(A,B,E,F) */ F.DT_SUB_GRP FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID UNION SELECT F.LT_SUB_GRP FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID ) UNION SELECT B.MEM_ID, C.CT_SUB_GRP, C.BRNCH_ID FROM SYS0005M A , ORG0001D B , ORG0005D C , SYS0064M M WHERE A.BRNCH_ID = B.BRNCH AND B.MEM_ID = C.MEM_ID AND C.MEM_LVL = '2' AND B.STUS = '1' AND A.CODE = (SELECT /*+ leading(E) INDEX(E SAL0023D_IDX5) USE_NL(A,B,E,F) */ F.DT_BRNCH_CODE FROM SAL0001D A , SAL0045D B , SAL0023D E , SYS0064M F WHERE A.SALES_ORD_ID = #{ORD_ID} AND A.SALES_ORD_ID = B.SALES_ORD_ID AND B.ADD_ID = E.CUST_ADD_ID AND E.AREA_ID = F.AREA_ID) ) C, (SELECT TO_CHAR ( (TO_DATE(#{S_DATE}, 'DD/MM/YYYY') - 1) + LEVEL, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INS_DATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (SELECT CODE FROM SYS0013M WHERE CODE_ID = #{termDtCd})) TB ORDER BY MEM_ID, INS_DATE ASC
